Daylight Tips & Notes for BG 3

The Grassland passive feature of the Circle of the Land Druid grants you this Spell at Level 5. For any non-summon spell that lasts until Long Rest, the caster does not need to be in your party once you leave camp as long as the spell does not require concentration.
